ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows® 8 64; 4th Generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache)
1TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart Protection; 16GB DDR3 1600MHz RAM (2 Dimm)
15.6-inch diagonal HD+ BrightView LED-backlit Display (1366 x 768); 6 Cell Battery
Intel HD Graphics 4600; Intel® 2x2 802.11b/g/n WLAN and Bluetooth® 4.0 plus WiDi Support with Intel® Smart Connect Technology; Fingerprint Reader; 4 SuperSpeed USB 3.0; 1 HDMI; 1 RJ45; 1 headphone-out/microphone-in combo
Standard Keyboard; Beats Audio with 4 Speakers; Fingerprint Reader; 65W AC power adapter; 1 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 15t-j000 Quad Core Edition 15.6" Notebook PC, 4th Gen i7-4700MQ; ENVY 15 with 16GB DDR3L RAM Upgrade
